pkgmetadata.longdescription: Phylogenetic Tree Search Using Custom Optimality Criteria // Searches for phylogenetic trees that are optimal using a user- defined criterion. Implements Profile Parsimony (Faith and Trueman, 2001) doi:10.1080/10635150118627, and Successive Approximations (Farris, 1969) doi:10.2307/2412182. Handles inapplicable data using the algorithm of Brazeau Guillerme and Smith (2017) doi:10.1101/209775.
